name: War of the Worlds: The Arrival
name_original: War of the Worlds: The Arrival
description:
After UFO incident, humans have taken extraterrestrial tecnhology. They're building things they though impossible. Extraterrestrials want revenge and they send tons of soldiers to earth to take what is yours. Try defending earth from extraterrestrial arrival. Good luck soldier!

If played on PC enabling fullscreen is recommended. Play on smartphone for best experience.

Not try playing at 2K or above, not HD.
